game.name: Black Squad
game.categories: Multi-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Black Squad is a free-to-play military first-person-shooter. Players can master their skills and show off their strategies with a wide range of game maps, modes, and weapons to choose from. Join thousands of FPS players worldwide in one of the most played games on Steam!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Black Squad is a free-to-play military first-person-shooter. Players can master their skills and show off their strategies with a wide range of game maps, modes, and weapons to choose from. Join thousands of FPS players worldwide in one of the most played games on Steam!

reviewHighlights.text: A dead game ,Don't waste your time on this garbage.
fun game and better than cs
